name: Jequirty arbus precatorius
Relationship: Compare: JEQUIRITOL (in cases of trachoma and pannus to engraft a new purulent inflammation. The proteid poisons contained in Precatorius seeds are almost identical in their physiological and toxic properties with the similar principles found in snake venom).

Eyes: Purulent conjunctivitis; inflammation spreads to face and neck

dosage: Mother tincture diluted locally and 3X internally.
